version_description:
Thank you for using PayMe! We are constantly making improvements to give you the best payments experience. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

Here’s what’s new in our latest update:
- Performance improvements and bug fixes

If you love using PayMe, please let us know with a review : -)

Thank you for using PayMe! We are constantly making improvements to give you the best payments experience. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

Here’s what’s new in our latest update:
- PayMe just got a major performance boost, vroom-vroom!
- You asked, we delivered: you can now have 2 repeating digits in your PIN
- See an issue? Just take a screenshot and upload it directly to our Customer Service
- Say goodbye to some pesky bugs

If you love using PayMe, please let us know with a review :-)

If you love using PayMe, please let us know with a review :-)

感谢您选用PayMe！我们致力改善以为您提供最佳转账体验。要享用最全面服务，请确保您已容许程式更新。

更新内容包括：
-Touch ID 现已启用! 令您转账更快、更安全
-预设隐私设置 – 给想永远隐藏付款讯息的您
-您「听」到今日PayMe有所不同吗？调较至响闹模式，然后叫您的朋友试试转账给您 :)
-Bug Fix

如果您喜欢使用PayMe，请提交意见让我们知道更多 :)

感谢您选用PayMe！我们致力改善以为您提供最佳转账体验。要享用最全面服务，请确保您已容许程序更新。

更新内容包括：
- 仍然为记住密码而烦恼? 现在可以用您的手提电话号码登入PayMe!
- 注册PayMe现在变得更简单
- 提升系统功能

如果您喜欢使用PayMe，请提交意见让我们知道更多。

感谢您选用PayMe！我们致力改善以为您提供最佳转账体验。要享用最全面服务，请确保您已容许程序更新。

更新内容包括：
- 提升系统功能

如果您喜欢使用PayMe，请提交意见让我们知道更多。

- 无需再为尴尬的对话而烦恼，透过全新的「收款请求」功能即可向好友收款。
- 立即将您手机通讯录的联系人同步至PayMe，让您轻轻松松把他们加为PayMe好友！
- 分拆账单很麻烦？PayMe已内置计算机让您轻易处理。
- 因应市场趋势，从2017年10月10日开始，我们将更新付款及收款的上限分别至每年港币100,000元。

我们致力令PayMe更臻完善，为您带来更好的用户体验。

感谢您使用 PayMe！我们不断提升服务，务求为您提供最佳付款体验。请开启“更新”功能，确保不会错过任何系统更新。

以下是最新的更新内容：
- 恭喜发财！您现在可以向亲友同事送上具个人特色的 PayMe 红包了！

- 正在使用 iPhone X 吗？请立即更新 PayMe，享受为您量身定做的完美体验

- 就是要快！立即享受更快速的 PayMe 体验

如果您喜欢使用 PayMe，欢迎留下评语告知我们。:-)
我们修正了已知问题以提升用户体验。

"智慧就是适应变化的能力。"－史蒂芬·霍金

不断更新就是我们适应变化的方式。因此我们不断改善为了让您得到更好的体验。一如以往，如果您遇到任何问题或需要我们的协助，您可以随时透过网页上＂需要帮助？＂(https://payme.hsbc.com.hk/zh-cn/help) 联络我们，让我们为您跟进。

感谢您使用 PayMe！我们不断提升服务，务求为您提供最佳付款体验。请开启“更新”功能，确保不会错过任何系统更新。
如果您喜欢使用 PayMe，欢迎留下评语告知我们。

感謝您選用PayMe！我們致力改善服務以提供更佳的過數體驗。要享用最全面的服務，請確保您已容許程式自動更新。
更新內容包括：
- 修正已知問題以提升用戶體驗。
如果您喜歡使用PayMe，請向我們提交您的寶貴意見。:-)

Here is what’s new in our latest update:
- Introducing bank account top ups! We’ve made it easy to link a HSBC bank account to top up your balance. This will be available for another 20+ Hong Kong banks as soon as possible. What's more, enjoy a much higher monthly top up limit of HKD50,000 when you top up with your bank account… happy paying!

If you love using PayMe, please let us know with a review.

Love shopping? Then you'll love this:
- You can now pay with PayMe when you shop in the HKTVmall app. Indulge yourself with round-the-clock shopping and a seamless payment experience. Happy shopping!
- Did you know you can now top up your balance with an HSBC bank account and enjoy a top up limit of up to HKD50,000 a month? Now you can shop more and pay more friends with PayMe! Coming to another 20+ Hong Kong banks soon.

Introducing PayCodes!
- Pay and add friends even faster by using PayCodes, simply scan the QR code to make payments and add friends using our in-app scanner.

Thank you for using PayMe! We are constantly making improvements to give you the best payments experience. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

Here’s what’s new in our latest update:
- Say goodbye to some pesky bugs; we’ve fixed them to bring you a better experience

If you love using PayMe, please let us know with a review :-)

PayMe's getting a power-up!

We're adding security enhancements to keep you and your account safer than ever.

• If you forget or change your PIN, you'll now be required to verify with a one-time verification code sent to your registered mobile number so we can ensure it's really you.
• We've also added SMS notifications to confirm any changes to your account (including change of email address, PIN, mobile number and mobile device), so you stay in control.

PayMe’s stepping up our game!

We’re strengthening our security and improving the app to bring you a better user experience.

• Some operating systems which are no longer supported by Apple will also no longer be supported by PayMe. To make sure you can continue using PayMe, please update your OS to iOS 10 or above
• Say goodbye to some pesky bugs we’ve fixed

PayMe got a power up!

You can now use PayMe to pay your favourite Hong Kong businesses just as easily as you pay your friends!

• Update to the latest version and you can start paying selected HK businesses by simply scanning their PayCode
• Simply swipe left from your home screen to access your scanner and scan a business’ PayCode – payment made!
• Keep your eyes peeled for our logo at participating businesses

Fresh new PayMe, powered by you! New look featuring non-HSBC top ups and FPS – your feedback has inspired the biggest redesign since we launched in 2017!
Here’s a taste of what’s new…
•Fresh, new look and feel
•Pay businesses as easily as friends
•Top up from more selected HK banks – not just HSBC
•Pay friends faster with FPS
SVF License Number: SVFB002

Even easier access to the friends you pay most with QuickPay!

-PayMe now learns who you pay most often and puts them front and centre in your Discover tab

-Say goodbye to some pesky bugs we’ve fixed to bring you a better experience

Thanks for using PayMe! To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

Claim your personalised PayLink!
-Grab your personalised PayLink to send to friends as another handy way to get paid - they just tap the link and pay!
Thanks for using PayMe! To make sure you never miss a new release, keep your Updates turned on.

We’re strengthening security for our users and improving the app to bring you a better user experience.
•Say goodbye to some pesky bugs we’ve fixed

You can now pay bills via PayMe!
Pay selected government and utility bills with PayMe by scanning their QR code.

Introducing a great new way to pay businesses! Try it now at Circle K
We just launched a great new feature that gives you an easy, new way to pay HK businesses.
Starting with all Circle K stores, you can now pay using consumer-presented QR code.

Update to our latest version and you’ll see a big change to your home screen with the introduction of your discover timeline – so called because it’s packed with tips, tricks, offers and promotions for you to discover!
You can now top up and get higher limits by adding your Dah Sing Bank account. More accounts coming soon, so make sure you have updates turned on!

Update to the latest version to see big improvements to help you find your most-used features!
• More powerful P button! Tap P and you’ll now find everything you need to pay friends and businesses, access the scanner and request money.
• Find more of your stuff in Me! We’ve also grouped top up, transfer to bank, My PayCode and more of your personal stuff in the Me tab.

Update to the latest version to see some big improvements to help you find your most-used features!
• With our new PayLink enhancements you can now share your customised PayLink in web browsers!

Update to the latest version to see some big improvements to help you find your most-used features!
• With our new PayLink enhancements you can now share your customised PayLink in web browsers!

Update to the latest version to see some awesome new features we know you've been requesting - split bills in PayMe and quick actions!
• Let PayMe do the math! Put our calculator away because you can now split those lunch bills and more with your friends in PayMe
• Tap and hold the PayMe app icon to select quick action shortcuts without needing to open the app
